title: Afghanistan Current Account
description: Afghanistan recorded a Current Account deficit of 1047.43 USD Million in the first quarter of 2021. Current Account in Afghanistan averaged -2217.89 USD Million from 2003 until 2021, reaching an all time high of -426.87 USD Million in the second quarter of 2020 and a record low of -7558 USD Million in the fourth quarter of 2011. Current Account is the sum of the balance of trade (exports minus imports of goods and services), net factor income (such as interest and dividends) and net transfer payments (such as foreign aid). This page provides - Afghanistan Current Account - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Da Afghanistan Bank
